Everyday Fresh

The finest breads and pastries in the heart of Norwich

Fresh bread baked daily

Handmade sweets and pastries

Specially made for your events

Established in 2011, our bread is hand-crafted using the finest local ingredients.

Freshly baked each day, our bread combines traditional recipes with the finest locally sourced ingredients, ensuring a perfect balance of flavor, texture, and aroma in every loaf.

From crusty sourdough to soft, buttery rolls, every batch is handcrafted with care. Our bakers take pride in creating bread that not only tastes exceptional but also brings warmth and comfort to your table.

Whether enjoyed at breakfast, as part of a hearty lunch, or alongside a comforting dinner, our bread is made to elevate every meal. Each loaf is a testament to our dedication to quality, craftsmanship, and the joy of sharing fresh, wholesome bread with our community.

From flaky pastries to rich confections, every creation is made with love and care.

Each of our sweets and pastries is lovingly handmade using the finest ingredients. Every treat is crafted with attention to detail, ensuring a perfect balance of flavor, texture, and presentation.

From delicate Ã©clairs and flaky croissants to indulgent tarts and buttery cookies, our selection is designed to delight every palate. Our bakers combine traditional techniques with a touch of creativity to make every pastry a small masterpiece.

Every pastry is made fresh daily and presented beautifully, whether for casual treats or special occasions. Our commitment to quality ensures each bite is an experience to remember.

Handcrafted sweets and cakes designed to delight every guest at your celebration.

Our specially made cakes and desserts are crafted to make every celebration unforgettable. Using premium ingredients and artistic techniques, we design each creation to be both visually stunning and delicious.

From birthdays to weddings, we tailor each dessert to your theme and preferences. Every detail is thoughtfully considered to create a memorable centerpiece for your event.

Each cake and dessert is delivered with care, ensuring it arrives in perfect condition. We work closely with you to provide a seamless experience from design to presentation, making your special day truly extraordinary.

What our customers are saying

I stopped in on a whim and ended up leaving with a box full of pastries. The croissants are buttery perfection, and the cinnamon rolls might just be the best I've ever had. You can taste the love and craftsmanship in everything here.

- Anna Davis

This bakery is pure magic! The sourdough has the perfect crust, and the inside is soft and chewy. I tried one slice and had to take a whole loaf home. The atmosphere feels so cozy and welcoming - you can taste the passion behind every bake.

- Sophie Clarke

The moment you step inside, the scent of freshly baked bread hits you, and you just know you're in the right place. Their tarts are crisp and buttery, filled with the sweetest seasonal fruit. It's become my go-to stop every weekend morning.

- James Porter

I ordered a birthday cake here, and it was absolutely stunning - moist, flavorful, and beautifully decorated. Everyone at the party asked where it came from! They've truly mastered the balance of flavor, texture, and presentation

- Ethan Miller

Proudly baking for your party, your event, and your breakfast
